section_2:p_2:
ja This is a slightly more advanced Redux example, that simulates a
          shopping cart: getting the products, adding/removing items to the
          cart, and a checkout action, that can sometimes randomly fail (to
          simulate where you would add failure handling).
section_2:p_3:
ja This view, as well as its 2 child elements, {1} and
        {2} are connected to the Redux store.
